modName: Legend of Zelda- Razor Sword V2 Updated
summary: First Time with Modeling and Texturing and modeled the Razor Sword from Majoras Mask.
descriptionHtml:
Modeled in Maya 2012 and textured with Photoshop. This is my first time Modeling and Texturing so it may not be the best but its something.

As this is the first time modeling and modding skyrim, this item is craftable and upgradable, But i have no idea how to put where the item is located so i just used the console command to get it in my inventory.


*Updated* Added New Pics
Version 2.0: 
-Made the guard and hilt more rounded, instead of oval. 
-Blood now shows correctly on the blade. 
-Completely retextured. 
-Added description to the Razorsword ingame. 
-Lowered the damage a bit.
 I used Mudbox 2011 to Re-Texture the sword. and photoshop to add the triforce to the blade. This was my first time actually going and texturing the sword all in Mudbox. Only used photoshop to add the triforce and add the normal map using the NVIDIA Normal Map Filter.
author: EpicSenseney
